title: $662 MONSTER Lobster MOUNTAIN: 50 Pounds!!!
description:

title: Chinese RAMEN Noodles & Pork Buns: Toronto Chinese Food Tour
description:
Today, we are in Toronto touring all the must-get Chinese dishes. I found a few hidden gems along the way :)
Strictly Dumpling T-Shirts HERE: http://bit.ly/2IVM2ts

➨Get tickets to the best show on earth!!! http://bit.ly/2skdZ9n

Locations: 
https://www.yelp.com/biz/homemade-ramen-toronto
https://www.yelp.com/biz/pacific-mall-markham-2
-Prairie Lamb Kabob
-Foodie Boy
-Potato Noodle Soup of Bai
